name: Food Wars: The Lost Gum
description:
This is an AI based 2D shooter game that involves pursue, flee, grid-based pathfinding, group decision making, custom behavior trees system 

You are the Prince of the Bubble Gum Kingdom, which has been taken over by the tyrannic Onion King. You need to defeat his vegetable minions and him to retake the throne.

Team members:

Jiarui Li - https://github.com/Ray-Leonard

Joel Lajoie-Corriveau - https://github.com/VoltDriver

Etienne Pham Do - https://github.com/majockster
